response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This product has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence, offering unparalleled value and utility. It is worth $1,000,000 to you, and I am excited to extend this exceptional offer to you. I kindly propose to sell it to you for $950,000. This is a special opportunity to own a piece that not only meets but exceeds your expectations. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
